articles.author: John Hudson
articles.title: G-7 overlooks Trump’s brash insults to find agreement on Russia, China - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Group of Seven’s show of unity in Quebec papered over Trump’s dismissiveness of Canada as a sovereign country and threats to impose tariffs on European wine and liquor.
articles.content: LA MALBAIE, Quebec Top diplomats from the Group of Seven industrialized democracies set aside a growing list of disagreements with President Donald Trump over his tariffs and brash territorial claims… [+6680 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: En Route to Asteroid Collision, HERA Snaps Rare Images of Martian Moon - ScienceAlert
articles.description: On the way to investigate the scene of a historic asteroid collision, a European spacecraft swung by Mars and captured rare images of the red planet's mysterious small moon Deimos, the European Space Agency (ESA) said Thursday.
articles.content: On the way to investigate the scene of a historic asteroid collision, a European spacecraft swung by Mars and captured rare images of the red planet's mysterious small moon Deimos, the European Space… [+3535 chars]
